com.epam.jwd.task01.logic

Class NecklaceSortAndFilterMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.jwd.task01.logic.NecklaceSortAndFilterMaker

  • public final class NecklaceSortAndFilterMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class containing only methods for sorting and filtering of elements Gemstone in NecklaceCreator Necklace

    No instances of this class can exist, and all its fields and methods are static.

    Sorting method is based on ComparatorStonesByPrice comparator

    Filtering method is based on the field TransparencyLevel of the elements

    See Also:
    NecklaceCreator, ComparatorStonesByPrice

      static void sortGemsByPrice(NecklaceCreator necklace, SortOrderName order)

        public static void sortGemsByPrice(NecklaceCreator necklace,
                                   SortOrderName order)
        Sort elements Gemstone in Necklace by the field stonePrice in the given order
        Parameters:

      • filterStonesByTransparency

        public static void filterStonesByTransparency(NecklaceCreator necklace,
                                              int minTransparency,
                                              int maxTransparency)
        Filter elements Gemstone in Necklace by the field TransparencyLevel in the given range
        Parameters:
        necklace - an instance of Necklace, created by NecklaceCreator
        minTransparency - lower range limit of the field TransparencyLevel of the elements
        maxTransparency - upper range limit of the field TransparencyLevel of the elements
